about_the_game:
Join the Discord to keep up-to-date with playtests!

Features

  • Genre-bending combat system, featuring a mix of highly mechanical shooter and melee gameplay

  • Massively multiplayer "tournament-style" extraction. Up to 256 players per session

  • Cohort System. Join a class of 256 players with up to 7 friends for a multi-day expedition into the Tower

  • High-intensity Souls-like boss fights

  • Atmospheric world including character story quests and hidden discoveries

  • Main game is free-to-play with zero microtransactions. Pay a subscription for custom game modes

Story

In a world forever altered by the sudden and mystical arrival of the Tower, courageous individuals are drawn to its mysterious depths, driven by an insatiable curiosity. The towering structure, seemingly crafted by a higher intelligence, boasts perilous creatures and artifacts of immense power.

You are an adventurer part of the Delver Association, an organization dedicated to the Tower's research and extraction of precious resources.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K | Intel Core i5-8400 or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X | AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 480, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: An ultra-hardcore roguelite PvPvE extraction game featuring a unique combat system blending FPS and fighting games
